about_the_game:
Survivors of Mayhem - a fast paced fantasy survivor game. Embark on a heart-pounding journey through waves of fantasy battle, where chaos reigns, and your every decision could mean the difference between life and death. You'll face relentless waves of enemies, upgrade your character, pick and choose from over two dozen abilities, a hundred items, and stat upgrades to try to survive.

Will you become a true survivor in the face of Mayhem? Find out as you embrace the chaos, uncover the mysteries, and carve your path to victory.

Features for the initial Early Access release includes:

  • 3 classes with 4 subclasses each

  • 1 Evolution for each signature class ability (Longsword, Longbow, and Fireball)

  • 26 Abilities

  • 100+ items of varying rarities, stats, and mechanics

  • 3 Levels

  • 6 Boons to help you in your battle

  • Interactable world items and reward objects

  • Upgradeable meta progression

  • Partial controller support, works in game for all character interactions. Some menu navigation doesn't fully work yet.

The release version will contain even more content, and other features, ranging from traps, more levels, more classes, unique abilities for each advanced class, more items, more abilities, enemies, full controller support and more - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

  • Processor: Intel i3 or Amd Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
